Plot: About a man who has trouble with his job, trouble with women, and uses food to deal with it all.
Title: I Want Someone to Eat Cheese With
Actors: Jeff Garlin, Dan Castellaneta, Mina Kolb, Paul Mazursky
tomatoConsensus: This quirky romantic comedy's realistic depiction of a lonely guy looking for love is sure to please fans of Curb Your Enthusiasm's Jeff Garlin.
